Name: Maison Charles Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of frost the rim of the glass with powdered sugar & finely chopped mint. Moisten the outside rim of a glass with lime juice and roll in powdered sugar & mint..
History: Pronounced 'May-Sawn Sharl', this recipe is adapted from David A. Embury 's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
